notes: Unresearched.

online_system: Allegheny County Recorder of Deeds Online Search
fee_structure: Index search free; Images: $1.00/page first 10 pages (casual), $0.50/page (commercial), remaining pages free; Historical records 1792-1857 free
notes: Document indexes from 1986-present; imaged deeds 1976-present; historical records 1792-1857 available free.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: First 500 pages per year free, then $0.50/page; copies $0.50/page in office
notes: Grantor/grantee index from 1800-present.

fee_structure: Free access for Bedford County residents; made free in 2020
notes: Deeds dating back to 1771 digitized. Access made free during COVID-19 pandemic in 2020.

fee_structure: $0.50/page plus $2.00 fee for copies; $10.00 plus $2.00 fee for certified copies
notes: Deeds from 1752; mortgages from 1949; misc documents from 1910.

fee_structure: Time and page-based billing through LANDEX Remote; in-office copies $0.25/page
notes: County formed in 1846. LANDEX Remote requires debit account setup.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: LANDEX Remote: ~$0.10/min + $0.15/copy with prepaid account. LANDEX Webstore: free index search but paid document viewing.
notes: Most restrictive suburban Philly county. No free online viewing.

fee_structure: Online search and viewing free; physical copies have fees
notes: Central location for all Butler County land records.

fee_structure: No subscription fees; print/download $0.50/page. First 500 pages per year free through SearchIQS
notes: Tyler system: 1986-present; SearchIQS: 1924-1985. Records prior to 1924 only in person.

fee_structure: Time and page-based billing through LANDEX Remote; document copies $0.50/page
notes: Cameron County formed March 29, 1860. LANDEX subscription required for remote access.

fee_structure: $0.15 per minute / $0.10 per page loaded; requires account setup
notes: Documents from 1988-present. Copy fee at office is $0.50/page plus $1.50 certification.

fee_structure: $10 account activation fee; credits $0.05-$0.15 per click; typical document view $0.10-$0.45
notes: One of PA's most complete computer indexed imaging systems. Credits expire after one year.

fee_structure: Free guest access for search/view. Historical pre-1993 requires SearchIQS subscription.
notes: Free guest access 1905-present. Historical records pre-1993 need separate subscription.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee; $1.10/minute access rate; $25/month minimum fee
notes: Land records from 1839 (county formation) to present.

fee_structure: LANDEX Remote: time-based billing. LANDEX Webstore: credit card required. $0.50 per name over 4; $2 per page over 4.
notes: Two access options: LANDEX Remote and LANDEX Webstore.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee; $1.10/minute access rate; $25/month minimum fee
notes: Over 200,000 scanned documents available. E-recording NOT available.

fee_structure: $0.20 per minute online; requires software download and debit account setup
notes: Access to indexes and images from 1974 to present.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: Free online search and viewing. Office copies: $0.50/page standard, $10/document certified
notes: All deeds and misc documents from 1785 to present; mortgages from 1979 to present.

fee_structure: none
notes: 35M+ document images spanning 240 years. Free Google-like portal. Model for PA counties.

fee_structure: Guest access free but redacted; registered account with credit card required for full access. Office copies $0.50/page.
notes: Guest users have limited access with some information redacted.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25/month minimum
notes: Subscription-based access through INFOCON. E-recording available through CSC and Simplifile.
Fayette County states 'there is no fee to view a public record.' Needs full classification.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25/month minimum
notes: Deed indices from 1983; images for deeds after 1997.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25/month minimum
notes: Tax maps available free through GIS Web Tool.

fee_structure: $12/day with $1/image download OR $300/month unlimited. Guest search available free.
notes: Land records indexed and imaged from June 6, 1925 to present.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25/month minimum
notes: Documents from 1982-present; prior to 1982 in Old Book Inquiry section. Physical records from 1787.

fee_structure: Search free. Download: $0.50/page + $2 convenience fee. Subscriptions: $80/month single user unlimited.
notes: Free search and view through indiana.pa.publicsearch.us. Downloads require payment or subscription.

fee_structure: $25 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25/month minimum
notes: Online records from August 1984 to present. E-recording available through CSC.

fee_structure: Time & page based billing for subscriptions; WEBSTORE option for one-time searches.
notes: County formed in 1831; deed records and indices date from that year.

fee_structure: Free search and view; $0.50/page for copies, $2.00 additional for certified; 2.5% credit card fee
notes: Two systems: Eagle Recorder (1957-current) and Laserfiche Historical Index Books (1878-1956). Free public access since 2010.

fee_structure: Free search as guest; $0.25/page for copies, $5.00 for certifications
notes: Records date back to county formation on May 10, 1729. Multiple search portals available.

fee_structure: No charge for standard copies; $0.50 for physical copies; certified copies $1.50 additional
notes: First county in PA to launch GovOS Cloud Search. Over 1 million records. Free Property Alert service.

fee_structure: Subscription required through LANDEX Remote or pay-per-document via LANDEX Webstore.
notes: Land records date to 1813 but online images only from 1956-present. Free Property Viewer available.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required for modern records. Historical records (1786-1967) available free.
notes: Split system: free historical access via separate portal; modern records behind LANDEX paywall.

fee_structure: Guest search available; subscription plans required for document viewing and downloads.
notes: All deed and land records from 1795 to present available online.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: Free guest index search; subscriptions: 1-Day $5.00, 30-Day $40.00, 6-Month $225.00, 1-Year $400.00; copies $0.25/page
notes: Index records from 1972; digital images from 1986. Historical indexes extend to 1803.

fee_structure: Cooperative fee-based subscriber service. Contact Infocon for pricing.
notes: Index for Recorder of Deeds begins with 1993. Physical records from 1789 available at courthouse.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: Copies $0.50/page plain; $10.50 certified. Free account required for search/view.
notes: Free account creation required. Search and view at no cost; fees only for copies.

fee_structure: $25.00 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25.00/month minimum fee
notes: Records from January 1, 1997 to present available through INFOCON.

fee_structure: Subscription required; copies $0.50 per page, certifications $2.50 per document
notes: Searchable index from 1991 with document images.

fee_structure: Free index searching via Webstore; fees apply for document copies.
notes: Uses LANDEX Webstore for one-time users and LANDEX Remote for frequent users.

fee_structure: Index searching free via Webstore; $2 first page, $0.75 additional pages, $5 order fee.
notes: LANDEX Webstore allows free name searches. E-recording available via Simplifile, CSC, and EPN.

fee_structure: Free Public Search Login shows watermarked documents. Downloads: $15/24hrs, $60/week, $195/year.
notes: Watermarked viewing is free. Downloading/printing requires subscription. Pre-1974 records not digitized.

fee_structure: $0.50 per page to view documents, maximum $5 per document; printing during viewing is free
notes: Free registration available for alerts; credit card required to view/download documents.

fee_structure: Free index searching via Webstore; $2 first page, $0.75 additional pages, $5 order fee.
notes: LANDEX Remote requires subscription with debit account. LANDEX Webstore operates pay-per-view.

fee_structure: Free searching; non-subscribers $1.00 per page for watermarked preview/printing/downloading
notes: Recorded Land documents from March 1, 1949 to present. Maps available from June 1921.

fee_structure: Index searching free via Webstore; fees apply for document copies.
notes: Only certain records available online. Records include deeds, mortgages, estates, subdivision plans.

online_system: LANDEX Remote / County Real Estate Search
fee_structure: County website has free real estate search; LANDEX Remote for document access. In-office copies $0.50/page.
notes: County website offers free Real Estate Search, Assessed Value Search, and Real Estate Sales Search tools.

fee_structure: LANDEX Remote: time and page-based billing; LANDEX Webstore: pay-per-document
notes: eRecording available through CSC and Simplifile. Free Landex Record Alert service available.

fee_structure: LANDEX Remote: per minute and page fees; LANDEX Webstore: per document. In-office copies $0.50/page
notes: Deed and mortgage index spans 1810 to present, but LANDEX records from 1974 onwards.

fee_structure: LANDEX Remote: time and page-based billing; LANDEX Webstore: pay-per-document
notes: Two options: LANDEX Remote (Windows app for frequent users) or LANDEX Webstore (browser-based).

fee_structure: Subscription-based access through pa.uslandrecords.com
notes: Records from January 1, 1962 to present. Records prior to 1962 are on microfilm only.

fee_structure: $25.00 setup fee, $1.10/minute access rate, $25.00/month minimum. In-office copies $0.50/page
notes: Real-time access to live county databases. eRecording available through CSC.

fee_structure: Small subscription fee required. Written requests $5.00 payable to Warren County Recorder of Deeds
notes: Real estate records from 1985 to present available through LANDEX.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: LANDEX subscription required.
notes: LANDEX county.

fee_structure: Free online search and viewing. In-office copies $0.50/page, certified copies $1.50 each
notes: Free public access to deed records from 1850 to present. Tax map numbers required since 2009.

fee_structure: Free online index search and viewing. Fees apply for document copies.
notes: Free access to deed records from 1842 (county inception) to present through GovOS.

fee_structure: Online copies $0.20/page. Office copies $0.50/page. LANDEX and SearchIQS have separate fees.
notes: Multiple systems: LANDEX for 1944+ (search.yorkdeeds.com), SearchIQS for pre-1944 historical records.
